name: #2 Katashi
description:
Katashi

Race: Human

Subraces and Variants:
Ethnicity: Japanese
Dragonmark Variant: Mark of Finding

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 26 years
Height: 5'11"
Weight: 175 lbs.
Eyes: Hazel
Skin: Brown

Gender: Male
Class: Artificer
Artificer Specialty: Battle Smith
Background: Cloistered Scholar
Occupation: Explorer

Trait: I'm convinced that people are always trying to steal my secrets.
Ideal: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Neutral)
Bond: I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.
Flaw: Unlocking an ancient mystery is worth the price of a civilization.

Description:
Appearance: Distinctive posture (crooked or rigid)
High Ability: Wisdom-perceptive, spiritual, insightful
Low Ability: Intelligence-dim-witted, slow
Talent: Knows thieves' cant
Mannerism: Twirls hair or tugs beard
Interaction Trait: Arrogant
Values: Nation (Any), Dedicated to fulfilling a personal life goal
Flaw or Secret: Foolhardy bravery
